text:
It may work for some environments, but what about others where management
demands data separation/isolation between departments? 
So instead of everyone locally sharing updates we’re left with several small
islands of update sharing. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax 
Canal Insurance Company 
101 N. Main Street, Suite 400 
Greenville, SC 29601 
[cid:image001.jpg@01DA541B.446D12A0]
